channel.title: Make item have donator requirement! pl0xxxx help!
channel.description: ok for delta how to i make it so if the player is not a donator when they try to wear it. it says [you must be a donator to wear this item] and if there a donator it lets them wear it pl0zzzzzz help!!!!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2009, 05:44:13 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Make item have donator requirement! pl0xxxx help!
item.dc:creator: @h3llzdevilz h3llzdevilz
item.description:
@h3llzdevilz wrote:

open client.java and search for

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){

u should see

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){ sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape."); return false; }
under that add but please replace ## with item code

if(wearID == ## && donator == 0){ sM("You must be donator to wield this!."); return false; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2009, 06:45:32 am[/size][hr][quote=“h3llzdevilz”]open client.java and search for

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){

u should see

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){ sM("You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape."); return false; }
under the last { of that add this but please replace ## with item code

if(wearID == ## && donator == 0){ sM("You must be donator to wield this!."); return false; }[/quote]

Read full topic

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = #### && donater) {//you might need to change the donater, i never worked with donater stuff. Also, replace the #### with the item ID. else { sM("You must be a donator to use this item");

something like that.
